name: bj-vtocl
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- w0
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wcel(c0, c1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
-| w1
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- w0
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wcel(c0, c1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
-| w1
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

|- w0
-| wcel(c0, c1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
-| w1
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Remove dependency on ~ ax-ext , ~ df-clab and ~ df-cleq (and ~ df-sb and ~ df-v ) from ~ vtocl . (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
